content.rendered:
Main ingredients:

Aqua, Sodium Coceth30 – Sulfate. PEG80 – Sorbitan Laurate. Decanoyl/ octanoy|-glycerides. Propylene Glycol, lodopropyny!
Butylcarbamate. Imidazolidinyl Urea, EDTA
Disodium, Fragrance.

How to use:

Morning & Night
Wet your face or eyelashes with water.
Apply a small amount of Lash Cleanser to a cleansing brush.
Gently lather the foam cleanser to your lashes and right down to your eyelid for at least 5 seconds.
Rinse thoroughly with water.
Gently pat dry with a lint-free towel.
Brush your lashes with a mascara wand.
